Class Issue

java.lang.Object
model.Issue
public class Issue extends Object
Class for storing Issue details
Version:
0.1
Author:
Artur Twardzik

  • Field Summary

    Fields
    Modifier and Type
    Field
    Description
    private User
    assignee
    The user currently assigned to work on this issue.
    private List<Comment>
    comments
    A list of comments made on this issue.
    private LocalDateTime
    createdAt
    Timestamp indicating when the issue was created.
    private String
    description
    Detailed explanation of the issue or bug.
    private LocalDateTime
    dueDate
    The deadline by which the issue should be resolved.
    private UUID
    id
    Unique identifier for this issue.
    private Priority
    priority
    The priority level of the issue (e.g., LOW, MEDIUM, HIGH).
    private User
    reporter
    The user who reported this issue.
    private BugStatus
    status
    The current status of the issue (e.g., OPEN, CLOSED, IN_PROGRESS).
    private Set<String>
    tags
    A set of textual tags associated with this issue for categorization or filtering.
    private String
    title
    Short descriptive title summarizing the issue.
    private LocalDateTime
    updatedAt
    Timestamp indicating the last time the issue was updated.

  • Field Details

    • id

      private UUID id
      Unique identifier for this issue.

    • title

      private String title
      Short descriptive title summarizing the issue.

    • description

      private String description
      Detailed explanation of the issue or bug.

    • createdAt

      private LocalDateTime createdAt
      Timestamp indicating when the issue was created.

    • updatedAt

      private LocalDateTime updatedAt
      Timestamp indicating the last time the issue was updated. May be null.

    • dueDate

      private LocalDateTime dueDate
      The deadline by which the issue should be resolved. May be null.

    • reporter

      private User reporter
      The user who reported this issue.

    • assignee

      private User assignee
      The user currently assigned to work on this issue. May be null.

    • status

      private BugStatus status
      The current status of the issue (e.g., OPEN, CLOSED, IN_PROGRESS).

    • priority

      private Priority priority
      The priority level of the issue (e.g., LOW, MEDIUM, HIGH).

    • tags

      private Set<String> tags
      A set of textual tags associated with this issue for categorization or filtering.

    • comments

      private List<Comment> comments
      A list of comments made on this issue.

  • Constructor Details

    • Issue

      public Issue(String title, String description, User reporter) throws InvalidIssueDataException
      Creates a new Issue with the given title, description, and reporter.
      Parameters:
      title - the title of the issue; must not be empty
      description - the detailed description of the issue; must not be empty
      reporter - the user reporting the issue; must not be null
      Throws:
      InvalidIssueDataException - if any of the required fields are invalid or empty

    • Issue

      public Issue(String title, String description, User reporter, LocalDateTime dueDate, User assignee, BugStatus status, Priority priority, Set<String> tags) throws InvalidIssueDataException
      Creates a new Issue with additional optional data such as due date, assignee, status, priority, and tags.
      Parameters:
      title - the issue title; must not be empty
      description - the issue description; must not be empty
      reporter - the reporter of the issue; must not be null
      dueDate - the due date; may be null
      assignee - the user assigned to the issue; may be null
      status - the current bug status; defaults to BugStatus::OPEN if null
      priority - the issue priority; defaults to Priority::LOW if null
      tags - the set of tags; may be null or empty
      Throws:
      InvalidIssueDataException - if title, description, or reporter are invalid

  • Method Details

    • assignUser

      public void assignUser(User user) throws InvalidIssueDataException
      Assigns a user to this issue.
      Parameters:
      user - the user to assign; must not be null
      Throws:
      InvalidIssueDataException - if user is null

    • setDescription

      public void setDescription(String description) throws InvalidIssueDataException
      Updates the description of the issue.
      Parameters:
      description - the new description; must not be empty
      Throws:
      InvalidIssueDataException - if the description is empty

    • setStatus

      public void setStatus(BugStatus status) throws InvalidIssueDataException
      Sets the status of this issue.
      Parameters:
      status - the new status; must not be null
      Throws:
      InvalidIssueDataException - if status is null

    • setTitle

      public void setTitle(String title) throws InvalidIssueDataException
      Sets the title of this issue.
      Parameters:
      title - the new title; must not be empty
      Throws:
      InvalidIssueDataException - if the title is empty

    • setDueDate

      public void setDueDate(LocalDateTime dueDate) throws InvalidIssueDataException
      Sets the due date of this issue.
      Parameters:
      dueDate - the new due date; must be in the future
      Throws:
      InvalidIssueDataException - if dueDate is before the current time

    • setPriority

      public void setPriority(Priority priority) throws InvalidIssueDataException
      Sets the priority of this issue.
      Parameters:
      priority - the new priority; must not be null
      Throws:
      InvalidIssueDataException - if priority is null

    • setAssignee

      public void setAssignee(User assignee)
      Sets the assignee for this issue.
      Parameters:
      assignee - the new assignee; may be null

    • addTag

      public void addTag(String tag)
      Adds a tag to the issue.
      Parameters:
      tag - the tag to add; ignored if blank

    • addComment

      public void addComment(Comment comment)
      Adds a comment to this issue.
      Parameters:
      comment - the comment to add

    • getId

      public UUID getId()
      Returns:
      the unique identifier of this issue

    • getTitle

      public String getTitle()
      Returns:
      the title of this issue

    • getDescription

      public String getDescription()
      Returns:
      the detailed description of this issue

    • getReporter

      public User getReporter()
      Returns:
      the user who reported this issue

    • getStatus

      public BugStatus getStatus()
      Returns:
      the current bug status

    • getPriority

      public Priority getPriority()
      Returns:
      the current priority level

    • getCreatedAt

      public LocalDateTime getCreatedAt()
      Returns:
      the timestamp when this issue was created

    • getTags

      public Set<String> getTags()
      Returns:
      the set of tags assigned to this issue

    • getComments

      public List<Comment> getComments()
      Returns:
      the list of comments associated with this issue

    • getUpdatedAt

      public Optional<LocalDateTime> getUpdatedAt()
      Returns:
      an Optional containing the timestamp at which the issue was updated, or empty if not set

    • getDueDate

      public Optional<LocalDateTime> getDueDate()
      Returns:
      an Optional containing the due date, or empty if not set

    • getAssignee

      public Optional<User> getAssignee()
      Returns:
      an Optional containing the assignee, or empty if unassigned
